author: amassari
msg: Recognize ISO-10646-UCS-4 as a synonym for UCS-4

author: mrglavas
msg: Fixing a bug. We cannot cache the Location object from the start document event.
To get the correct line and column numbers it needs to be read at the point where
the error occurs. To handle this introduced a wrapper around the XMLStreamReader
which reads the Location from the reader on demand.

author: bodewig
msg: Don't use getReference in <isreference> unless really required.  PR 44822.
